entry.title: Keep the Matches away from the Sunflower
entry.summary:
Author: DiamondBat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,442Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 68

Summary: (In this AU, the Justice League banded together under different circumstances and everyone’s secret identity is intact. Ma and Pa Kent are also very much alive and doing fine in Smallville.)Batman and Superman have a love/hate relationship going on due to some misunderstandings and unexpressed emotions. With no other way of dealing with the unresolved tension, both of them end up on the same dating app. From there, a romance blossoms that neither of them expected or have any way of escaping.

entry.title: The Devil Wears Prada
entry.summary:
Author: cloudfrog

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,877Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 311

Summary: Gotham's youngest prince, Damian Wayne, has built a thriving career and a carefully crafted image in the fashion industry. But beneath it all, he's been drowning in silence ever since Jon Kent drifted away. Until he meets Leon Devereaux-Burciaga, a bold designer who pulls him into an unexpected marriage proposal. Their connection sparks at Milan Fashion Week, setting the tabloids into a frenzy. Damian sees an opportunity to redefine himself. But when Jon reenters his life, there are choices to make. No powers AU

entry.title: Yeah? Yeah.
entry.summary:
Author: sillybob24

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,407Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 59

Summary: Bruce hears Clark say from the back of the couch, “Gosh, Bruce. If I knew it was this bad, I would’ve-““No,” Bruce cuts him off. He feels too dizzy, dazed, cracked open and stirred to talk to him.A pause. “No?”Clark sounds confused, and Bruce will get it through his head now. “No.”Bruce Wayne is sick, and Clark Kent will unquestionably be by his side, even if his Bat is a grump.

entry.title: Man of Tomorrow
entry.summary:
Author: clumsycanon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,527Chapters: 8/12Kudos: 32

Summary: Clark Kent always wanted to be a hero.When Vought calls after his viral rescue, he says yes. Yes to the suit, the fame, the Seven. Yes to the spotlight he’s spent his whole life hiding from.But under the surface of glittering galas and carefully staged interviews, something darker simmers—inside the tower, inside Homelander’s smile, inside himself.And then there’s Bruce Wayne: billionaire, enigma, walking contradiction. The only person who sees Clark—not just Superman. Not just the symbol.But even Bruce has secrets. And when an impossible robot drops from the sky glowing with something that hurts Clark in ways he’s never known, everything begins to crack.Clark must face who he is. Kal-El. Clark Kent. Superman.Alien. Weapon. Hope.The truth is out there.And it might just break them all.~~~~~~A Superman x The Boys fusion where Clark joins the Seven, falls for Bruce Wayne, and unravels everything he thought he knew—about Vought, about Krypton, and about himself.

entry.title: Despite everything, it’s still you
entry.summary:
Author: VettTrece

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,351Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Bruce Wayne, lonely, distrustful, and worn down by a city that never changes, witnesses the impossible: a man flies in front of him, no wires, no tricks, no logical explanation. Superman has arrived. Not as the man from Bruce's world, but as a figure who shouldn’t have crossed the threshold.He hails from a different universe, one with different rules. A place where, according to his logic, Bruce is meant to be his soulmate.But in this Gotham, there is no destiny, there is no hope. In his home there's no room for myths.Until now.

entry.title: Take Me Out
entry.summary:
Author: NoodleDragon324

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,106Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 61

Summary: Bruce knew that Clark was an attractive man, so he shouldn’t be surprised that when he shows up to galas, all awkward smiles and blushing, people would have their eye on him. It was something Bruce was familiar with himself, of course. He had his reputation to maintain. But after whatever had gotten into Clark this last month, whatever had gotten into him, was quickly coming to a peak as Clark locked eyes with him across the room. Two beautiful women were draped over his sides, pawing at his chest, but the real kicker was the young man practically sat in Clark’s lap, eyeing his lips with half-lidded lust, hand slowly caressing the side of his face. For the first time in his life, Bruce felt what others probably do when people look at Brucie Wayne. For what was now becoming a frequent experience, Bruce felt a sharp stab of jealousy in the pits of his stomach and anger tightening his muscles. Clark was physically occupied with other pretty socialites, but seemed to only have eyes for Bruce, looking at him like he knew what it was doing to him. With a rush of adrenaline at the thought, Bruce decided that enough was enough. It was time to do something about this.

entry.title: Strangers in the night
entry.summary:
Author: WatercolorAru

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,242Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: It wasn’t a good year for Clark. He broke up with his girlfriend and Lex Luthor bought the Daily Planet, so he chose to move back to his parent’s house. Not that he was complaining about that last one. It was complicated, okay?He felt like he had nothing left in Metropolis, but he didn’t feel like he had a place in Smallville, Kansas either. As always, his existence was lonely, so when he heard about a fair in town, he went, hoping to be cheered up.AKABruce was investigating a smuggling ring. There had been museum thefts recently, but his investigations as Batman had shed no light to the matter, so he chose to infiltrate a small carnival, which was, most likely, a stop of stolen objects on their way to the Pacific, all along an overly excited Dick Grayson, who missed the circus life.Based on a Tumblr post by secretidentie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,265Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Jason Todd meets Damian Wayne in the League of Assassins. They start training together and become like brothers. The League forbids anyone from getting too close unless arranged and they are often punished. Talia realizes she can’t leave her only son to continue to grow up in these conditions and helps Jason escape with Damian. Jason becomes Red Hood while Damian finds Bruce Wayne. Damian promises Jason he will wait for when he’s ready to come home but superheroes often don’t get to wait until they’re ready.
